tatami.pc.agent.webService

Class WSAgentImplementation

  • java.lang.Object
    • tatami.pc.agent.webService.WSAgentImplementation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WSAgentImplementationInterface

    public class WSAgentImplementation
extends java.lang.Object
implements WSAgentImplementationInterface
    Implements the operation needed for registering the agent as a web service and allowing the agent to access web services. //FIXME: treat exceptions better, return them to WSAgent.
    Author:
    Andrei Olaru

      Invokes a web service with a single, String, parameter, and a String return value.
      java.lang.String doSimpleAccess(java.lang.String uri, java.lang.String request)
      Invokes a web service using an HTTP connection (instead of using the WS plug-in).
      boolean registerService(AgentComponent agent, java.lang.String agentName, java.lang.String agentClass)
      Registers the agent as a web service.
      boolean unregisterWS(AgentComponent agent)
      Unregisters the web service corresponding to the agent.
